channel.title: [SMP][PVP]Tupac9[Towny][McBans]
channel.description:
[center] We are Tupac9. We are a small community that formed after breaking off with a larger one, and we are glad to accept any new members who wish to be with us. We're looking for new and interesting people who can bring something to the table.
Important: We're running NoCheat+, LogBlock, and McBans. Don't try to grief, it will just be rolled-back instantly, so you're really only inconveniencing yourself. Don't try to x-ray or use other hacks, because you'll be McPermaSuperBanned on the spot.The minimum rep required to join is 7. IP: 198.12.123.208 Dynamic Map: 198.12.123.208:8123
Ranks: User - Default rank for Tupac9. Experienced - Given to players who apply for it after two weeks of play. Veteran - Awarded to players on a respect-basis. Old Timer - Awarded to players who have been with the server since the dawn of time.
Staff Ranks: Moderator - A Tupac9 policeman, specializing in griefs. Admin - Does what a Moderator does and more. (Most of the Staff-action will be behind the scenes).
Major Plugins: Towny NoCheat LogBlock WorldEdit MCBans BOSEconomy PeX uHome Deadbolt ChestShop Worldguard
Rules: 1. No griefing 2. No hacking 3. Swearing is fine 4. PvP is legal, but complaining about it is not. 5. Don't be an ass 6. Common-sense 7. No abuse of glitches 8. No staff disrespect Please note that we are pretty lax with non-griefing rules, so getting banned is a pretty big accomplishment.
Stealing: Stealing is legal, as long as it's from an unlocked chest. If you need help locking your chests, you can visit the deadbolt bukkit page.
Whitelist?: For now, no. We're pretty confident in our ability to manage the few newcomers that we get (if any).[/center]

item.title: [SMP][PVP]Tupac9[Towny][McBans]
item.dc:creator: @Unwpi Unwpi
item.description:
@Unwpi wrote:

[center]
We are Tupac9. We are a small community that formed after breaking off with a larger one, and we are glad to accept any new members who wish to be with us. We’re looking for new and interesting people who can bring something to the table.

Important: We’re running NoCheat+, LogBlock, and McBans. Don’t try to grief, it will just be rolled-back instantly, so you’re really only inconveniencing yourself. Don’t try to x-ray or use other hacks, because you’ll be McPermaSuperBanned on the spot.The minimum rep required to join is 7.
IP: 198.12.123.208
Dynamic Map: 198.12.123.208:8123

Ranks:
User - Default rank for Tupac9.
Experienced - Given to players who apply for it after two weeks of play.
Veteran - Awarded to players on a respect-basis.
Old Timer - Awarded to players who have been with the server since the dawn of time.

Staff Ranks:
Moderator - A Tupac9 policeman, specializing in griefs.
Admin - Does what a Moderator does and more.
(Most of the Staff-action will be behind the scenes).

Major Plugins:
Towny
NoCheat
LogBlock
WorldEdit
MCBans
BOSEconomy
PeX
uHome
Deadbolt
ChestShop
Worldguard

Rules:

  1. No griefing
  2. No hacking
  3. Swearing is fine
  4. PvP is legal, but complaining about it is not.
  5. Don’t be an ass
  6. Common-sense
  7. No abuse of glitches
  8. No staff disrespect
    Please note that we are pretty lax with non-griefing rules, so getting banned is a pretty big accomplishment.

Stealing:
Stealing is legal, as long as it’s from an unlocked chest. If you need help locking your chests, you can visit the deadbolt bukkit page.

Whitelist?:
For now, no. We’re pretty confident in our ability to manage the few newcomers that we get (if any).[/center]
